Elements.Name: Ring
Description: The amount of score rewarded for collecting rings.

Elements.Name: Enemy
Description: The amount of score rewarded for defeating enemies.

Elements.Name: Physics
Description: The amount of score rewarded for breaking physics objects.

Elements.Name: PointMarker
Description: The amount of score rewarded for passing through checkpoints.

Elements.Name: RedRing
Description: The amount of score rewarded for collecting red rings.

Elements.Name: RainbowRing
Description: The amount of score rewarded for passing through rainbow rings.

Elements.Name: ItemBox
Description: The amount of score rewarded for breaking item boxes.

Elements.Name: SuperRing
Description: The amount of score rewarded for collecting super rings.

Elements.Name: TrickFinish
Description: The amount of score rewarded for finishing trick combos.

Elements.Name: Tricks
Description: The amount of score rewarded for performing trick combos.

Elements.Name: Life
Description: The amount of score rewarded for collecting lives.

Elements.Name: DashRing
Description: The amount of score rewarded for passing through dash rings.

Elements.Name: QuickStep
Description: The amount of score rewarded for quick stepping whilst running.

Elements.Name: Drift
Description: The amount of score rewarded for drifting.

Elements.Name: Balloon
Description: The amount of score rewarded for popping balloons.

Elements.Name: Super
Description: The amount of score rewarded for being Super Sonic at the frequency specified in the behaviour section.

Elements.Name: BoardTrick
Description: The amount of score rewarded for jumping off trick ramps using the board.

Elements.Name: timeBonusAlgorithm
Description: The Lua equation that calculates the time bonus.
Exposed variables:
• totalRingCount - total number of rings obtained throughout the stage.
• totalVelocity - total velocity built up throughout the stage when passing checkpoints.
• ringCount - number of rings the player finished with.
• minutes - minutes on the timer.
• seconds - seconds on the timer.
• elapsedTime - total amount of time passed in seconds.
• score - total score the player finished with.
• scoreLimit - the maximum amount of score the player can obtain.
• minSeconds - elapsed time in seconds the player must finish below for a higher time bonus.
• maxSeconds - elapsed time in seconds the player must finish below for a time bonus.
Set this to '0' to disable it.

Elements.Name: ringBonusAlgorithm
Description: The Lua equation that calculates the ring bonus.
Exposed variables:
• totalRingCount - total number of rings obtained throughout the stage.
• totalVelocity - total velocity built up throughout the stage when passing checkpoints.
• ringCount - number of rings the player finished with.
• minutes - minutes on the timer.
• seconds - seconds on the timer.
• elapsedTime - total amount of time passed in seconds.
• score - total score the player finished with.
• scoreLimit - the maximum amount of score the player can obtain.
• minSeconds - elapsed time in seconds the player must finish below for a higher time bonus.
• maxSeconds - elapsed time in seconds the player must finish below for a time bonus.
Set this to '0' to disable it.

Elements.Name: speedBonusAlgorithm
Description: The Lua equation that calculates the speed bonus.
Exposed variables:
• totalRingCount - total number of rings obtained throughout the stage.
• totalVelocity - total velocity built up throughout the stage when passing checkpoints.
• ringCount - number of rings the player finished with.
• minutes - minutes on the timer.
• seconds - seconds on the timer.
• elapsedTime - total amount of time passed in seconds.
• score - total score the player finished with.
• scoreLimit - the maximum amount of score the player can obtain.
• minSeconds - elapsed time in seconds the player must finish below for a higher time bonus.
• maxSeconds - elapsed time in seconds the player must finish below for a time bonus.
Set this to '0' to disable it.

Elements.Name: scoreLimit
Description: The maximum amount of score the player can obtain.

Elements.Name: superSonicTimer
Description: The amount of time in seconds the player is rewarded for being Super Sonic.

Elements.Name: scoreFormat
Description: The string format used to display the score on the HUD.
Examples:
%d - write the raw value.
%06d - write the value with six digit padding.

Elements.Name: customXNCP
Description: Disables Score Generations' HUD in favour of using a custom layout from another mod.

Elements.Name: debugLua
Description: Prints Lua debug information to the console window.

Elements.Name: forbiddenStages
Description: The list of stages that don't display or count your score.
Elements.DefaultValue: bde, bde001, blb, blb001, bms, bms001, bne, bne001, bpc, bpc001, bsd, bsd001, bsl, bsl001
